name: PhotoRobot 2
description:
PhotoRobot 2 – the follow-up to the PhotoRobot game with new design and faces!

How good is your photographic (Eidetic) memory? Do you want to enhance it?

This fun and interactive game will both challenge and help train your photographic memory skills and serve as a great pastime.

PhotoRobot 2 is a game of face memorization skills, designed for the entire family and suitable for people of all ages.
